scheduled_jobs.title: Scheduled Jobs
scheduled_jobs.info_description: These jobs run automatically on their schedules. You can enable/disable them or trigger them manually.

consumer.question: How do I book a session?
consumer.answer: Browse our coaches, select one that matches your needs, choose an available time slot, and complete the booking. You'll receive a confirmation email with all the details.

consumer.question: What is the cancellation policy?
consumer.answer: You can cancel a booking up to 24 hours before the scheduled time for a full refund. Cancellations within 24 hours may be subject to a cancellation fee as per the coach's policy.

consumer.question: What payment methods are accepted?
consumer.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, Google Pay, Apple Pay, and other digital payment methods depending on your region.

consumer.question: How do online sessions work?
consumer.answer: After booking, you'll receive a link to join the video session. Simply click the link at the scheduled time to connect with your coach. Make sure you have a stable internet connection and a quiet space.

consumer.question: How do I find the right coach for my child?
consumer.answer: Use our search filters to narrow down by subject, level, price, and availability. Read reviews from other parents, check the coach's profile and qualifications, and consider booking a trial session.

consumer.question: Can I reschedule a booking?
consumer.answer: Yes, you can reschedule a booking up to 24 hours before the session. Go to your bookings, select the session, and choose a new available time slot.

consumer.question: Are group sessions available?
consumer.answer: Some coaches offer group sessions at discounted rates. Look for the 'Group Sessions' badge on coach profiles or filter by session type in your search.

consumer.question: How can I contact support?
consumer.answer: You can reach our support team through the Contact Us form in the app, or email us directly at support@maestrohabitat.com. We typically respond within 24 hours.

provider.question: How do I become a coach on Maestro Habitat?
provider.answer: Click 'Become a Coach' in your profile, complete the application form with your qualifications and experience, and submit for review. Our team will review your application within 3-5 business days.

provider.question: How do I set my rates?
provider.answer: You have full control over your pricing. Go to your coach settings to set your hourly rate. You can also create session packages with discounted rates for multiple sessions.

provider.question: How and when do I get paid?
provider.answer: Payments are processed weekly. You'll receive your earnings minus the platform fee directly to your linked payment account. You can view your earnings and payment history in the Earnings section.

provider.question: What is the platform fee?
provider.answer: Maestro Habitat charges a 10% platform fee on each completed session. This covers payment processing, platform maintenance, and customer support.

provider.question: How do I manage my availability?
provider.answer: Use the Calendar section to set your available hours. You can set recurring availability or block specific dates. Students can only book during your available times.

provider.question: What happens if a student cancels?
provider.answer: If a student cancels within 24 hours of the session, you may receive a cancellation fee as per your policy settings. The amount is configurable in your coach settings.

provider.question: What is a sponsored listing?
provider.answer: Sponsored listings appear at the top of search results, giving you more visibility. You can purchase sponsored placements in specific categories to reach more students.

provider.question: How do I get tax documents?
provider.answer: Tax reports (1099 equivalent) are automatically generated annually. You can access them in the Tax Reports section. Monthly summaries are also available for your records.
